00020 /**
00021  * @defgroup ApnsPHP_Push Push

00025 /**
00026  * The Push Notification Provider.
00027  *
00028  * The class manages a message queue and sends notifications payload to Apple Push
00029  * Notification Service.
00030  *
00031  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Push
00032  */
00033 class ApnsPHP_Push extends ApnsPHP_Abstract
00034 {
00035     const COMMAND_PUSH = 1; /**< @type integer Payload command. */
00036 
00037     const ERROR_RESPONSE_SIZE = 6; /**< @type integer Error-response packet size. */
00038     const ERROR_RESPONSE_COMMAND = 8; /**< @type integer Error-response command code. */
00039 
00040     protected $_aErrorResponseMessages = array(
00041         0   => 'No errors encountered',
00042         1   => 'Processing error',
00043         2   => 'Missing device token',
00044         3   => 'Missing topic',
00045         4   => 'Missing payload',
00046         5   => 'Invalid token size',
00047         6   => 'Invalid topic size',
00048         7   => 'Invalid payload size',
00049         8   => 'Invalid token'
00050     ); /**< @type array Error-response messages. */
00051 
00052     protected $_nSendRetryTimes = 3; /**< @type integer Send retry times. */
00053 
00054     protected $_aServiceURLs = array(
00055         'ssl://gateway.push.apple.com:2195', // Production environment
00056         'ssl://gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com:2195' // Sandbox environment
00057     ); /**< @type array Service URLs environments. */
00058 
00059     protected $_aMessageQueue = array(); /**< @type array Message queue. */
00060     protected $_aErrors = array(); /**< @type array Error container. */
00061 
00062     /**
00063      * Set the send retry times value.
00064      *
00065      * If the client is unable to send a payload to to the server retries at least
00066      * for this value. The default send retry times is 3.
00067      *
00068      * @param  $nRetryTimes @type integer Send retry times.
00069      */
00070     public function setSendRetryTimes($nRetryTimes)
00071     {
00072         $this->_nSendRetryTimes = (int)$nRetryTimes;
00073     }
00074 
00075     /**
00076      * Get the send retry time value.
00077      *
00078      * @return @type integer Send retry times.
00079      */
00080     public function getSendRetryTimes()
00081     {
00082         return $this->_nSendRetryTimes;
00083     }
00084 
00085     /**
00086      * Adds a message to the message queue.
00087      *
00088      * @param  $message @type ApnsPHP_Message The message.
00089      */
00090     public function add(ApnsPHP_Message $message)
00091     {
00092         $sMessagePayload = $message->getPayload();
00093         $nRecipients = $message->getRecipientsNumber();
00094 
00095         $nMessageQueueLen = count($this->_aMessageQueue);
00096         for ($i = 0; $i < $nRecipients; $i++) {
00097             $nMessageID = $nMessageQueueLen + $i + 1;
00098             $this->_aMessageQueue[$nMessageID] = array(
00099                 'MESSAGE' => $message,
00100                 'BINARY_NOTIFICATION' => $this->_getBinaryNotification(
00101                     $message->getRecipient($i),
00102                     $sMessagePayload,
00103                     $nMessageID,
00104                     $message->getExpiry()
00105                 ),
00106                 'ERRORS' => array()
00107             );
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111     /**
00112      * Sends all messages in the message queue to Apple Push Notification Service.
00113      *
00114      * @throws ApnsPHP_Push_Exception if not connected to the
00115      *         service or no notification queued.
00116      */
00117     public function send()
00118     {
00119         if (!$this->_hSocket) {
00120             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00121                 'Not connected to Push Notification Service'
00122             );
00123         }
00124 
00125         if (empty($this->_aMessageQueue)) {
00126             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00127                 'No notifications queued to be sent'
00128             );
00129         }
00130 
00131         $this->_aErrors = array();
00132         $nRun = 1;
00133         while (($nMessages = count($this->_aMessageQueue)) > 0) {
00134             $this->_log("INFO: Sending messages queue, run #{$nRun}: $nMessages message(s) left in queue.");
00135 
00136             $bError = false;
00137             foreach($this->_aMessageQueue as $k => &$aMessage) {
00138                 if (function_exists('pcntl_signal_dispatch')) {
00139                     pcntl_signal_dispatch();
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 $message = $aMessage['MESSAGE'];
00143                 $sCustomIdentifier = (string)$message->getCustomIdentifier();
00144                 $sCustomIdentifier = sprintf('[custom identifier: %s]', empty($sCustomIdentifier) ? 'unset' : $sCustomIdentifier);
00145 
00146                 if (!empty($aMessage['ERRORS'])) {
00147                     foreach($aMessage['ERRORS'] as $aError) {
00148                         if ($aError['statusCode'] == 0) {
00149                             $this->_log("INFO: Message ID {$k} {$sCustomIdentifier} has no error ({$aError['statusCode']}), removing from queue...");
00150                             $this->_removeMessageFromQueue($k);
00151                             continue 2;
00152                         } else if ($aError['statusCode'] > 1 && $aError['statusCode'] <= 8) {
00153                             $this->_log("WARNING: Message ID {$k} {$sCustomIdentifier} has an unrecoverable error ({$aError['statusCode']}), removing from queue without retrying...");
00154                             $this->_removeMessageFromQueue($k, true);
00155                             continue 2;
00156                         }
00157                     }
00158                     if ($nErrors = count($aMessage['ERRORS']) > $this->_nSendRetryTimes) {
00159                         $this->_log(
00160                             "WARNING: Message ID {$k} {$sCustomIdentifier} has too many errors ($nErrors/{$this->_nSendRetryTimes}), removing from queue..."
00161                         );
00162                         $this->_removeMessageFromQueue($k, true);
00163                         continue;
00164                     }
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 $nLen = strlen($aMessage['BINARY_NOTIFICATION']);
00168                 $this->_log("STATUS: Sending message ID {$k} {$sCustomIdentifier}: {$nLen} bytes.");
00169                 if ($nLen !== ($nWritten = (int)@fwrite($this->_hSocket, $aMessage['BINARY_NOTIFICATION']))) {
00170                     $this->_log("WARNING: Unable to send message ID {$k} {$sCustomIdentifier}. Written {$nWritten} bytes instead of {$nLen} bytes");
00171                 }
00172 
00173                 $bError = $this->_updateQueue();
00174                 if ($bError) {
00175                     break;
00176                 }
00177             }
00178 
00179             if (!$bError) {
00180                 $read = array($this->_hSocket);
00181                 $null = NULL;
00182                 $nChangedStreams = @stream_select($read, $null, $null, 0, $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout);
00183                 if ($nChangedStreams === false) {
00184                     $this->_log('ERROR: Unable to wait for a stream availability.');
00185                     break;
00186                 } else if ($nChangedStreams > 0) {
00187                     $bError = $this->_updateQueue();
00188                     if (!$bError) {
00189                         $this->_aMessageQueue = array();
00190                     }
00191                 } else {
00192                     $this->_aMessageQueue = array();
00193                 }
00194             }
00195 
00196             $nRun++;
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     /**
00201      * Returns messages in the message queue.
00202      *
00203      * When a message is successful sent or reached the maximum retry time is removed
00204      * from the message queue and inserted in the Errors container. Use the getErrors()
00205      * method to retrive messages with delivery error(s).
00206      *
00207      * @param  $bEmpty @type boolean @optional Empty message queue.
00208      * @return @type array Array of messages left on the queue.
00209      */
00210     public function getQueue($bEmpty = true)
00211     {
00212         $aRet = $this->_aMessageQueue;
00213         if ($bEmpty) {
00214             $this->_aMessageQueue = array();
00215         }
00216         return $aRet;
00217     }
00218 
00219     /**
00220      * Returns messages not delivered to the end user because one (or more) error
00221      * occurred.
00222      *
00223      * @param  $bEmpty @type boolean @optional Empty message container.
00224      * @return @type array Array of messages not delivered because one or more errors
00225      *         occurred.
00226      */
00227     public function getErrors($bEmpty = true)
00228     {
00229         $aRet = $this->_aErrors;
00230         if ($bEmpty) {
00231             $this->_aErrors = array();
00232         }
00233         return $aRet;
00234     }
00235 
00236     /**
00237      * Generate a binary notification from a device token and a JSON-encoded payload.
00238      *
00239      * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationBinary
00240      *
00241      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string The device token.
00242      * @param  $sPayload @type string The JSON-encoded payload.
00243      * @param  $nMessageID @type integer @optional Message unique ID.
00244      * @param  $nExpire @type integer @optional Seconds, starting from now, that
00245      *         identifies when the notification is no longer valid and can be discarded.
00246      *         Pass a negative value (-1 for example) to request that APNs not store
00247      *         the notification at all. Default is 86400 * 7, 7 days.
00248      * @return @type string A binary notification.
00249      */
00250     protected function _getBinaryNotification($sDeviceToken, $sPayload, $nMessageID = 0, $nExpire = 604800)
00251     {
00252         $nTokenLength = strlen($sDeviceToken);
00253         $nPayloadLength = strlen($sPayload);
00254 
00255         $sRet  = pack('CNNnH*', self::COMMAND_PUSH, $nMessageID, $nExpire > 0 ? time() + $nExpire : 0, self::DEVICE_BINARY_SIZE, $sDeviceToken);
00256         $sRet .= pack('n', $nPayloadLength);
00257         $sRet .= $sPayload;
00258 
00259         return $sRet;
00260     }
00261 
00262     /**
00263      * Parses the error message.
00264      *
00265      * @param  $sErrorMessage @type string The Error Message.
00266      * @return @type array Array with command, statusCode and identifier keys.
00267      */
00268     protected function _parseErrorMessage($sErrorMessage)
00269     {
00270         return unpack('Ccommand/CstatusCode/Nidentifier', $sErrorMessage);
00271     }
00272 
00273     /**
00274      * Reads and error message (if present) from the main stream.
00275      * If the error message is present and valid the error message is returned,
00276      * otherwhise null is returned.
00277      *
00278      * @return @type array|null Return the error message array.
00279      */
00280     protected function _readErrorMessage()
00281     {
00282         $sErrorResponse = @fread($this->_hSocket, self::ERROR_RESPONSE_SIZE);
00283         if ($sErrorResponse === false || strlen($sErrorResponse) != self::ERROR_RESPONSE_SIZE) {
00284             return;
00285         }
00286         $aErrorResponse = $this->_parseErrorMessage($sErrorResponse);
00287         if (!is_array($aErrorResponse) || empty($aErrorResponse)) {
00288             return;
00289         }
00290         if (!isset($aErrorResponse['command'], $aErrorResponse['statusCode'], $aErrorResponse['identifier'])) {
00291             return;
00292         }
00293         if ($aErrorResponse['command'] != self::ERROR_RESPONSE_COMMAND) {
00294             return;
00295         }
00296         $aErrorResponse['time'] = time();
00297         $aErrorResponse['statusMessage'] = 'None (unknown)';
00298         if (isset($this->_aErrorResponseMessages[$aErrorResponse['statusCode']])) {
00299             $aErrorResponse['statusMessage'] = $this->_aErrorResponseMessages[$aErrorResponse['statusCode']];
00300         }
00301         return $aErrorResponse;
00302     }
00303 
00304     /**
00305      * Checks for error message and deletes messages successfully sent from message queue .
00306      *
00307      * @return @type boolean True if an error was received.
00308      */
00309     protected function _updateQueue()
00310     {
00311         $aErrorMessage = $this->_readErrorMessage();
00312         if (!isset($aErrorMessage)) {
00313             return false;
00314         }
00315 
00316         $this->_log('ERROR: Unable to send message ID ' .
00317             $aErrorMessage['identifier'] . ': ' .
00318             $aErrorMessage['statusMessage'] . ' (' . $aErrorMessage['statusCode'] . ').');
00319 
00320         $this->disconnect();
00321 
00322         foreach($this->_aMessageQueue as $k => &$aMessage) {
00323             if ($k < $aErrorMessage['identifier']) {
00324                 unset($this->_aMessageQueue[$k]);
00325             } else if ($k == $aErrorMessage['identifier']) {
00326                 $aMessage['ERRORS'][] = $aErrorMessage;
00327             } else {
00328                 break;
00329             }
00330         }
00331 
00332         $this->connect();
00333 
00334         return true;
00335     }
00336 
00337     /**
00338      * Remove a message from the message queue.
00339      *
00340      * @param  $nMessageID @type integer The Message ID.
00341      * @param  $bError @type boolean @optional Insert the message in the Error container.
00342      * @throws ApnsPHP_Push_Exception if the Message ID is not valid or message
00343      *         does not exists.
00344      */
00345     protected function _removeMessageFromQueue($nMessageID, $bError = false)
00346     {
00347         if (!is_numeric($nMessageID) || $nMessageID <= 0) {
00348             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00349                 'Message ID format is not valid.'
00350             );
00351         }
00352         if (!isset($this->_aMessageQueue[$nMessageID])) {
00353             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00354                 "The Message ID {$nMessageID} does not exists."
00355             );
00356         }
00357         if ($bError) {
00358             $this->_aErrors[$nMessageID] = $this->_aMessageQueue[$nMessageID];
00359         }
00360         unset($this->_aMessageQueue[$nMessageID]);
00361     }
00362 }
